item.title: Pull but no push in git
item.description: $ git remote set-url --push origin no-pushing $ git push fatal: 'no-pushing' does not appear to be a git repository fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7556155/git-set-up-a-fetch-only-remote
